info.full_description: This is just one part of the network, run by the main developers of the project üêò It is not focused on any particular niche interest - everyone is welcome as long as you follow our code of conduct!

info.short_description: Mamot.fr is the mastodon social network instance maintained by La Quadrature du Net, digital freedom organization based in Paris
info.full_description:
mamot.fr is maintained by La Quadrature du Net sysadmin team, a team of volunteers who monitor, upgrade and answer to reports on the services provided by La Quadrature to everyone. We also provide Jabber, Jitsi meet, Searx and Etherpad service to anyone who need it. 
Our policy has been specifically written by our team, and is available in French here : https://mamot.fr/terms

info.short_description: Framapiaf is Framasoft's Mastodon instance. Framasoft is a popular and educational network promoting free software.
info.full_description:
Issu du monde √©ducatif et d√©sormais tourn√©e vers l'√©ducation populaire, Framasoft est avant tout un r√©seau de projets, dont le premier, l'annuaire Framalibre, remonte √† 2001.

Ces projets sont anim√©s par des personnes collaborant autour d'une m√™me volont√© : promouvoir les libert√©s num√©riques.

Le respect des libert√©s fondamentales des utilisatrices et utilisateurs, garanties par des contrats l√©gaux (les licences libres), est au c≈ìur du mouvement libriste et permet de s'assurer que l'humain reste en ma√Ætrise de l'outil num√©rique.

Le but de Framasoft est de proposer, principalement en ligne, un ensemble d'outils concrets et pratiques visant √† faciliter l'adoption :

    de logiciels libres (annuaire, cl√©s USB, installateur‚Ä¶) ;
    de cr√©ations culturelles libres (blog, traduction, maison d'√©dition‚Ä¶) ;
    de services libres (plus de 30 dans le projet D√©googlisons Internet).

Pr√©sent√© comme une ¬´ porte d'entr√©e dans le monde du Libre ¬ª, le r√©seau Framasoft souhaite se positionner comme un trait d'union entre la communaut√© des libristes et le grand public.

info.short_description: Fast, secure and up-to-date instance, welcoming everyone around the world. Join us!
info.full_description:
Why should you sign up on mstdn.io?

This instance is not focused on any theme or subject, feel free to talk about whatever you want. Although the main language is english, we accept every single language and country.

We're connected to the whole OStatus/ActivityPub fediverse and we do not block any foreign instance nor user.

We do have rules (see below), but the goal is to have responsible users. So far we haven't had any issue with moderation

The instance uses a powerful server to ensure speed and stability, and it has good uptime. We follow state-of-the-art security practices. See below for more technical details

Also, we have over 300 custom emojis to unleash your meming potential üëç

info.short_description: Generalistic and moderated instance. All opinions are welcome, but hate speeches are prohibited.
info.full_description:
Generalistic and moderated instance. All opinions are welcome, but hate speeches are prohibited.

Users who don't respect rules will be silenced, or suspended if they harass other people or if the the violation is considered too large.

info.short_description: A place for tech folks to discuss whatever interests them! Adheres to a code of conduct.
info.full_description: A place for tech folks to discuss whatever interests them! Adheres to a code of conduct. Blocks instances with hate speech and/or illegal content.

info.short_description: The cutest general purpose safe instance. We love science and beautiful things. LGBT+ and PoC are welcome.
info.full_description:
Octodon.social is a general purpose instance, where topics are mostly technical and scientific, but there's a bit of everything.
Federates with everything, allows nearly everything lawful in France.
Moderation policy is explained in details on our /about/more page; it is a pretty safe space. Harassment, bullying, or hate speech are not tolerated.
As the definition is often forgotten and altered, a safe space is a community where people (especially women, PoC and LGBT+) are protected from oppression and everyday harassment. Our goal is for every member to feel safe and welcome. (but of course that doesn't apply if you break local rules by being aggressive towards someone else, for instance)

The Wandering Shop is a Mastodon instance initially geared for the science fiction and fantasy community but open to anyone.
info.full_description: The Wandering Shop is a Mastodon instance initially geared for the science fiction and fantasy community but open to anyone. We want our 'local' timeline to have the feel of a coffee shop at a good convention: tables full of friendly conversation on a wide variety of topics. We welcome everyone who wants to participate, so long as you're willing to abide by our code of conduct.

info.short_description: Instance autogestita in lingua italiana. Principalmente focalizzata sull'informazione.
info.full_description:
[it] E' un social network indipendente. L'amministrazione tecnica e' supportata dal collettivo bida. Per maggiori informazioni leggi il nostro manifesto (https://mastodon.bida.im/about/more)

[en]It is an independent social network. Technical administration is supported by the bida collective. For more information read our manifesto (https://mastodon.bida.im/about/more)

info.short_description: A small town with one of the most complete federated timeline. Stable and stock mastodon experience with a few differences, check the desc !
info.full_description:
Welcome to your new Mastodon home !

Mastodon.host feels like a small town, but one ultra connected to the world. We have a broad view of the fediverse on our federated timeline, and a small cosy local timeline.

As a general instance, we are not centered on a specific theme, or a specific language. Everyone is welcome as long as they follow the few rules we have. 

We always run the latest stable version of mastodon, providing you a stock experience, with the following modifications:
- 1024 character limit ( not 500 ).
- more search results ( 20 instead of 5 per type of search ).
- text search of status ( not restricted to only searching tags and users ).
- reboost and replies are shown in the timelines ( more complete view for everyone ).
- Your mastodon.host account is also a XMPP account ( Federated Instant Messaging, take a look at google to find a client and use your mastodon.host username and password to configure it ). Woohoo two services in one ! 
- home of federationbot, the one that allows us to have that awesome view of the federation !

We also have a very good view of the federation ( our federated timeline gives you a more broad view of the Mastodon network than a 'normal' instance, there's a lot to read in a lot of languages ).
Although we are a medium+ sized instance, we'd like to keep the feeling that you are at home and safe here. Never hesitate to contact the admin team if you have any questions !

Check us out or check our FAQ at https://mastodon.host/about/more !

info.short_description: Mastodon.at is a public Mastodon instance and federates with most instances in the Fediverse. Online since April 2017.
info.full_description:
Mastodon.at is a public Mastodon instance that's been running since April of 2017. We federate with other instances unless their community values are overwhelmingly incompatible with our Terms of Service. Our primary languages are English and German, but other languages are more than welcome.

Mastodon.at is maintained by an experienced sysadmin. User data is backed up to multiple locations at least once every hour to avoid data loss. We are hosted in France, with an additional server location in S√£o Paulo, Brazil.

info.short_description: Inst√¢ncia moderada com um foco em usu√°rios do Brasil. // Moderated instance with a focus on Brazilian users.
info.full_description:
Inst√¢ncia moderada com um foco em usu√°rios do Brasil, mas usu√°rios de outros lugares (e outras l√≠nguas) s√£o bem vindos. Discursos de √≥dio s√£o proibidos. Usu√°rios que n√£o respeitem as regras ser√£o silenciados ou suspensos, dependendo da severidade da viola√ß√£o.

Moderated instance with a focus on Brazilian users, but users from other places (and other languages) are also welcome. Hate speeches are forbidden. Users who don't respect the rules will be silenced or suspended, depending on the violation severity.

info.short_description:
mastodonten.de ist eine Mastodon Instanz offen f√ºr alle netten Leute. :-)
mastodonten.de is a Mastodon instance open to nice people
info.full_description:
Da "Geht gut miteinander um" einfach gesagt als getan ist, haben wir eine (nicht vollst√§ndige) Liste von Verhaltensweisen aufgestellt, die zu einer L√∂schung von Toots und zu einer Blockung von Accounts f√ºhren k√∂nnen, wenn die Probleme fortbestehen. Insbesondere tolerieren wir nicht:


- Bel√§stigung, Stalking, Doxxing
- Rassismus, Sexismus, Beschimpfungen oder deren Bef√ºrwortung
- Diskriminierung von Geschlechtern und sexuellen Minderheiten oder deren Bef√ºrwortung
- Gewaltt√§tige nationalistische Propaganda, Nazi-Symbolismus oder F√∂rderung der Ideologie des Nationalsozialismus
- Leute kontaktieren, die klar gemacht haben, dass sie keinen Kontakt wollen. Dogpiling
- Nicht markierter sexueller Inhalt, Gewaltdarstellungen oder Werbung
- Nicht getaggte oder automatisierte oder √ºberm√§√üige Werbung
- Bots, die ohne ihre expliziten Anfragen mit Nutzer interagieren

Bitte melden Sie Verhalten, das Sie st√∂rt. Das schlie√üt Verhalten von anderen Instanzen mit ein - wir sind sehr gerne bereit, mit Asshole-Instanzen die Verbindung zu unterbrechen.

Basierend auf dem "About" von chaos.social verf√ºgbar in deren Github-Repository.


Since "Be excellent to each other" is much easier said than done, we have a (non-exhaustive) list of behaviours that may lead to deletion of toots, and silencing or suspension of accounts, if problems persist. In particular, we do not tolerate:

- Harrassment, stalking, doxxing

- Racism, sexism, verbal abuse or advocation thereof

- Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof

- Violent nationalist propaganda, Nazi symbolism or promoting the ideology of National Socialism

- Contacting people who made clear they want no contact. Dogpiling/brigading

- Untagged sexual content, gore, or advertisement

- Untagged, or automated, or excessive advertisement

- Bots interacting with users without their explicit requests


Please report behaviour that bothers you. That includes behaviour from other instances - we are very willing stop federating with asshole instances.


(Based on the about of chaos.social)

info.short_description: Beer and free software lovers - Friendly atmosphere - Our server is hosted in France. #nsfw allowed
info.full_description:
Beer and free software lovers.
 #nsfw allowed
Our server is hosted in France

info.short_description: A social space for anyone in data, visualization, creative coding, and related arts and research.
info.full_description:
A social space for anyone in data, visualization, creative coding, and related arts and research. Share your work, discuss, critique, and ask for help! Come one, come all:

‚Üí creative coders
‚Üí data scientists and visualizers
‚Üí generative artists
‚Üí visual researchers, curators, and critics
‚Üí anyone else data- or visualization-adjacent

If you are curious about the world and creativity, you are welcome here.

info.short_description: Queer Party is a queer-oriented Mastodon instance which generally aligns itself with the policies and goals of a few other instances.
info.full_description: Queer Party is a queer-oriented Mastodon instance which generally aligns itself with the policies and goals of other instances such as mastodon.social, awoo.space and icosahedron.website, aiming as much as possible to be a safe space for its users. Federation is fully open, and operated in blacklist mode only, with the list being publicly available.

info.short_description: foxes and fox-like creatures
info.full_description: The Vulpine Club is a community for foxes and their associates, friends, fans, and other furry (and non-furry) creatures. We're pretty friendly and welcoming. =^^=

info.short_description: A Mastodon instance for people who love FOSS/Linux.
info.full_description:
What is fosstodon.org?

Fosstodon is a Mastodon instance that is dedicated to Free & Open Source Software, or FOSS as many call it. Fosstodon is for people who are interested in open source technology and the awesome community around it. Whether that be Linux, open source software like Firefox, or Mastodon itself. If you're interested in technology, Fosstodon is a great place to start.
info.topic: Technology, Linux, FOSS, Open Source, Software, Computers

info.short_description: soc.ialis.me is a generalist and leftist instance runt by a collective
info.full_description:
Our guidelines are currently being written ; but basically:

* Don't be a dick,
* No advertising, harassment, spam,
* No abuse on the API by local users (bots, ...),
* Any thing illegal under the French law will be removed and reported to the competent authorities.

Informations and status about the instance is posted to @admin. We are 8 forming a administration council ;  @b9AcE @href @jd @wxl @marxistvegan @stephanmaus @Famine @hecate.

Don't hesitate to ping either one of the list or @admin to talk about the instance, create an issue at ialisme/soc.ialis.me on GitHub, or privately at admin (at) soc.ialis.me.

The instance itself is hosted on servers at Online.net and Scaleway.com, in Paris, France. The database and files are frequently replicated on a couple of servers, and externally backuped.

info.short_description: Eldritch Caf√© est une instance Mastodon pour les personnes queers, f√©ministes et anarchistes ainsi que pour leurs sympathisant¬∑e¬∑s.
info.full_description:
Eldritch Caf√© est une instance Mastodon se voulant accueillante pour les personnes queers, f√©ministes et anarchistes ainsi que pour leurs sympathisant¬∑e¬∑s. Nous sommes principalement francophones, mais vous √™tes les bienvenu¬∑e¬∑s quelque soit votre langue.

Les r√®gles de Eldritch Caf√© sont les suivantes‚ÄØ:
1. Ne participez pas √† du harc√®lement, sous quelque forme que ce soit.
2. Ne rendez pas publiques des conversations priv√©es, sauf √† l‚Äô√©quipe de mod√©ration en cas de signalement.
3. Les injures raciales, sexistes ou oppressives en g√©n√©ral vous vaudront d‚Äô√™tre suspendu¬∑e, m√™me utilis√©¬∑e¬∑s dans des conversations non-publiques.
4. Il est permis de poster de la pornographie ou de la nudit√© sur l‚Äôinstance, mais seulement en marquant le contenu concern√© comme sensible et en aucun cas sur un fil public.
5. Soyez gentil‚ãÖles les un‚ãÖes avec les autres.

info.short_description: This instance is focused around the furry community, and is open to anyone interested in it.
info.full_description: This instance is focused around the furry community, and is open to anyone interested in it. It was created by @Tiwy57 originally for a small group of furry friends, but thought it might as well be open to all fluffies and scalies !
